DOC.brief_summary: After treatment for Hodgkin disease, secondary cancer, in particular breast cancer induced by treatment, are the first cause of death. The investigators will estimate the risk to develop breast cancer in this population of women treated for hodgkin disease, and will propose women at high rish to participate in an intensive screening program based on an annual detection based on mammography, echography, and RMI.
DOC.brief_title: Personalised Program for Women Treated for Hodgkin Disease
DOC.criteria: women > 18 years treated for Hodgkin disease signed informed consent high risk of breast cancer patients unable to have a regular followup
